name: Holodefense
description:
Holodefense: Revenge of the Takodachi.

A Hololive fan game where you recruit Smolmyth to defend against Takodachi who have absorbed the powers of Holomyth.

Each Takodachi has different strengths and weaknesses like the Kiaradachi healing from fire and Amedachi being weak to magic.  Additionally, each Smol defender has a different combat style such as SmolAme slowing time for all enemies in range or SmolKiara firing homing explosive fireballs.

This is an early prototype made for school, future plans include more levels and implement the story.

Controls:
Move Camera: WASD
Turn Camera: QE
Push Button/Place Tower/Select Tower: Left Mouse Button
Pause Game: (Bugged) Tab/Esc/P
